name: Dino Jump Game
description:
An addictive arcade game created with HTML5.

Features: -

  • Simple and Addictive 
  • Including Pixelarts(PSD Files) 
  • One Touch Control 
  • admob Ads Supported 
  • Replayable Gameplay 
  • Responsive 
  • Playable in all platforms (Mobile, PC, etc.) 
  • Including Constuct 2 file (.capx – all source) 

If you like the game and support please don’t forget to rate. I really appreciate it.
